meanings.definition: A male possessing exceptional strength, abilities, or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was known for his incredible powers, making him one of the supermales in the comic world.
meanings.sent2: The group of supermales worked together to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent3: The supermales decided to have a friendly competition to see who could lift the heaviest object.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fantasy, supermales are like mythical gods among men.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the supermales spread far and wide, inspiring many to believe in their own hidden strengths.
